Welcome to ``fixa`` Documentation
==============================================================================
Like the Ikea FIXA, it is my toolbox to fix things.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``fixa`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install fixa

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade fixa
